Text: I'm Gobu and ill be your guide
lets begin, first you need to create a username
to do this view the leaderboard below
please enter a username and close the leaderboard
next we will explore the store, please press the store button
press those arrows to see other items
as you can see you can't afford anything yet but we can fix that
for now let's head back to the main menu
now it's time to pick a moobling
swipe left or right to change mooblings
sadly you only have Gobu for now so go and select him
above is the score and gold count
the score will increase as you play and connect nodes
to do this drag your finger over a set of atleast 3 matching nodes, like this
be careful though sometimes bad nodes will spawn, these nodes can only be cleared with power-ups
these nodes are broken nodes that can't be matched anymore you will need to use the Super Bomb
Great! now these colourful nodes here are rainbow nodes, mixed nodes that have joined, use a Super Colour Remover on them
Great! now that bar below your score is this Mooblings happiness
when Mooblings get happy they fall asleep so raise that bar by connecting nodes
here let me help you, when a moobling falls asleep gold coins will start too fall onto the board
by connecting 3 or more gold pieces together they will be added to you gold total
now one last thing when a Moobling falls asleep the score multiplier indicated by the red number
will increase so your score will also increase faster, put lots of Mooblings to sleep
but once a Moobling wakes up your mulitiplier will go back down
well thats everything for now, return to the main scene and start collecting
